mapper.select: SELECT es.id, es.status, ep.id AS positionId, p1.name AS industryName, p2.name AS sectorName, p3.name AS positionName, p4.name AS typeName, ep.industry_code AS industryCode, ep.type_code AS typeCode, ep.sector_code AS sectorCode, ep.position_code AS positionCode, ep.min_salary AS minSalary, ep.max_salary AS maxSalary, ewa.id AS areaId, d1.name AS countryName, d2.name AS provinceName, d3.name AS cityName, ewa.country_code AS countryCode, ewa.province_code AS provinceCode, ewa.city_code AS cityCode FROM employ_status AS es LEFT JOIN expected_position AS ep ON es.id = ep.status_id AND ep.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN position AS p1 ON ep.industry_code = p1.code AND p1.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN position AS p2 ON ep.sector_code = p2.code AND p2.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN position AS p3 ON ep.position_code = p3.code AND p3.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN position AS p4 ON ep.type_code = p4.code AND p4.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN expected_work_area AS ewa ON es.id = ewa.status_id AND ewa.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN district_data d1 ON d1.code = ewa.country_code AND d1.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN district_data d2 ON d2.code = ewa.province_code AND d2.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN district_data d3 ON d3.code = ewa.city_code AND d3.is_delete = 0 WHERE es.uid = #{userId} AND es.is_delete = 0
